ygData.subject: Re: Fw: [EQMagicians] Just a thought..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ok lets settle down. I didnt join this mailing list to hear fighting and griping. Pointing out strenths and weakness of are classes. Im all for it. Gives
ygData.messageBody:
> Pricks like me? Bah, I wont take this part to the message list. Though
>it's interesting to note I'm "a prick" because I don't like the game or
>varant, and say so.
>
Ok lets settle down. I didnt join this mailing list to hear fighting and
griping. Pointing out strenths and weakness of are classes. Im all for it.
Gives me some more feel for my char. The one thing I want topoint out is
that. This is a pianear game. The first of its kind. They have nothing to go
by. They are learing as they go. So as I se it. They are slowly makeing it
better. It's been around for over a year know. But you have to rember it
realy only been out a little over a mounth. Its a baby. It will only get
better. Have you ever boten a game and you liked it a little but it didnt
meet your standers. Well think how cool it is that the bugs in this game are
slowly getting fixed. Also most roll playing games. I put about 40 hours to
60 in them and they are done. God we havent even scratched the thing to
come. So use the # one vertue... we all know what that is, and wait.
